name: ClosetMaid Modular Storage Unit with 4 Drawers, Wood Closet Organizer, Stacking, Full Backer, Storage, Decorative Trim, White
product_description: The ClosetMaid Modular Storage Collection is a versatile and trendy organization system. With four shelf unit options, the collection allows you to utilize the entire system or individual pieces to fit your space. With an easy to assemble and install DIY design, add the Modular Storage collection to your closet, office, living room, den, mudroom or anywhere in your home for organization. The 4-Drawer Unit can be easily stacked with other units, or with other Drawer Units or used on its own. It features four convenient pull out drawers to store and organizes folded clothes, sweaters, pants, jeans, shoes, blankets, towels, crafts or small items. The decorative trim and full backer make this wood drawer system ideal for creating an upscale custom closet look. Add on other units like a Divided Shelf Unit, Shoe Shelf Unit or 3-Shelf Unit to build a walk in or reach in closet, or a full office shelf system. Easily add on accessories like Shelf & Hang Rod Kits or Doors available with solid or glass panes to create the organization system of your dreams. The Modular Storage Collection is available in trendy White or Smoky Taupe finishes to fit into the style of your home.

name: Aheaplus Closet System, Closet Organizer with 3 Wooden Drawers, Closet Organizer System, Walk-in Closet Wardrobe Clothes Rack with 4 Hanging Rods, Garment Rack, -4R, White
short_description: 【Stylish Wall-Mounted Closet System with 3 Drawers】Equipped with 3 wooden drawers which are durable, unlike other’s fabric drawers that are easily damaged and difficult to clean.Perfect for stashing your personal belongings, underwear or socks.The drawers can also stack some T-shirts. The metal drawer handles are more exquisite. The drawers are easy to open with smooth sliders. 【Customize and DIY Your Dream Walk-in Closet】With 4 expandable hanging rods, you can easily create a personalized closet system tailored to your space. It fits 4.2-9.8FT wide closets area.The length of the telescopic rods on both sides is 26.4 to 47.2 inches.Customizing your closet has never been this easy or stylish. Alternatively, you can also use the middle closet separately. 【High-Quality Wood Closet Organizer】This closet system is designed to withstand the test of time—no bending or breaking here. Say goodbye to flimsy metal racks and hello to durability with our premium wood closet organizer! With 1000+ lbs capacity and the ability to hold 400 pieces of clothing.And Our wardrobe is 6.7 feet tall, much higher than others, which ensures more space for hanging clothes and avoids stacking on the ground 【Multiple Installation Ways】Our wardrobe closet system with various installation ways. The hanging rods can be installed on one side or both sides to fit small spaces. The top rods with 2 different heights, if you need to hang long coats or dresses, simply install the rod at the higher position, and can also choose not to install the rod below. This versatile design allows you to create your perfect closet in any space 【Effortless Assembly & Exceptional Customer Service】 Our closet system is large and heavy, it is recommended that 2people install it together. All necessary hardware and tools are included, and every part is clearly labeled to make the setup easy.If you have any questions during installation, missing parts or damaged, don’t hesitate to reach out. We offer lifetime support, so whether it’s before or after your purchase, you can contact us to get respond quickly

name: Freestanding 2FT Closet System with 3 Wood Drawers, 24" Closet Organizer System with Hanging Rod & Shelves, Walk-in Closet Systems for Small Closets, White (24"L x 15" W x 80" H)
short_description: Freestanding 2FT Closet System with Drawers - Are you still struggling with clutter in a small space? Tired of traditional wall-mounted closets that lack mobility? Besiost 24 inch stand-alone closet organizer system not only provides you with the perfect storage solution, it is also designed with mobility in mind. Whether you're redecorating a room or moving, you can move it with ease. The perfect combination of drawers and shelves makes it easy to organize your stylish closet. Closet Organizer System with 3 storage options - 24" small closet system has 3 large wooden drawers + top storage area + hanging area. Small size but maximizes space, with each item having its place and can hold up to 150+ pieces of clothing or small items. The dimension of this freestanding closet system is 24"Lx15"Wx80" H. Not only is it perfect for small 2 feet spaces, but the size is very flexible, you can purchase according to the size of your space: buy 2 for 4 feet, buy 3 for 6 feet, and buy 4 for 8 feet. Heavy Duty Walk-in Closet - It is made of high-quality MDF wood panels with laminated surfaces to ensure durability. Weight capacity is up to 600 lbs. This is a huge upgrade from other older wire closet organizer systems. Our 24" closet system with drawers also comes with 2 anti-tip hardware to further enhance the sturdiness of the unit. Protect your kids and pets without worrying about the closet systems tipping over. Multi-Functional 24" Closet Organizion System - This freestanding closet system offers multiple storage solutions for your home. You can place it in your bedroom, living room, kitchen, laundry room or entryway and use it as a wardrobe, food storage pantry, laundry organizer system and more. One closet system for multiple uses, making it both attractive and functional. About Assembly & Quality Customer Service - As this closet system with drawers is tall and heavy, we recommend two people work together on the installation. We will also provide you with detailed instructions and all necessary hardware. If there are any quality issues, assembly problems or missing parts with the closet systems, please feel free to contact us and the Besiost customer support team will be at your service within 24 hours. name: ClosetMaid SuiteSymphony Wood Closet Organizer Starter Kit Tower and 3 Hang Rods, Shelves, Adjustable, Fits Spaces 5 – 10 ft. Wide, Pure White, 25"
short_description: ALL IN ONE CLOSET ORGANIZER: Wood closet organizer set with tower, (3) expandable rods and (5) interior shelves (2 adjustable) FITS CLOSETS 5 – 10 FT. WIDE: Fits closets 5 feet to 10 feet wide; Hang rods expand from 30 inches to 48 inches, can be installed on only one side of unit or trimmed for smaller closets SUITESYMPHONY COLLECTION: Add on drawers, doors, shoe shelves, additional rods, top shelves or other compatible units to create a custom closet (sold separately) VERSATILE HOME ORGANIZATION: Home organization system for closet spaces to store shirts, pants, jackets, sweaters, shoes, décor or other items ALL HARDWARE INCLUDED: Installation & assembly hardware included; Material: Manufactured wood - TSCA Title VI Compliant
product_description: SuiteSymphony - it's easy to design and install this beautiful storage and organization system in your home. This DIY closet organization system allows you to start with one of our organizer starter kits then add on accessories as needed. The tower starter kit clothes organizer includes (3) expandable hang rods from 30-48 in. wide and the closet tower that includes (2) adjustable shelves and (3) fixed shelves, plus the shelf at the top of the tower system. Our SuiteSymphony hanging closet organizer starter tower kits offer versatile adjustability to fit a wide variety of spaces due to the adjustable hang rods and the fact that they can be trimmed. Fit smaller spaces by installing rods on just one side. For a custom closet solution, add on compatible SuiteSymphony closet drawers available in multiple sizes to conceal folded items and clothing. There is even a jewelry tray organizer accessory that fits perfectly into the 25 in. x 5 in. drawer size! Add on closet doors to keep your items clean and dust free. These accessories are available in multiple styles with either raised or flat front panels. Other add on units include angled shoe shelves for shoes storage, additional closet rods or top shelves which can be installed above hang rods for extra shelf space. To create a fully custom closet, you can also enhance you space with a SuiteSymphony base unit or corner organizer shelf unit. SuiteSymphony - Affordable storage that fits your life.

name: SNSLXH 5 Pack Stackable Closet Storage Basket, Multifunctional & Foldable Closet Organizer for Bathroom Kitchen Laundry Room Wardrobe Storage, Space-Saving Clothes Storage Drawer Organizer, White
short_description: 【Versatile & Stylish】The folding closet organizers are a comprehensive storage and categorization solution that is perfect for organizing your lightweight items like clothes, toys, files and more. With its stylish neutral design, it effortlessly fits into any home, bedroom, bathroom, kitchen, office or study area. 【Stackable & Space-Saving】This 5 pack closet organizers and storage is designed to be easily stacked upon one another,According to your preferences and ideas, you can stack these organizers for storage management in 2 to 4 layers, The single closet organizer bins dimensions is 16.73*13.11*7.2 in, offering ample storage space. 【Easy installation】Our wardrobe storage shelves is designed for simplicity and convenience, allowing for easy installation with just a few simple steps. Moreover, The plastic storage closet organizers adopts a foldable design. you tuck it away when not in use, ensuring it doesn't occupy unnecessary space. 【Durable & Sturdy】Constructed from high-grade, waterproof PP plastic, this closet organizer storage box not only offers ample space but also ensures long-lasting durability. The shelves for closet reinforced side seams fortify the structure, ensuring an environmental-friendly and money-saving solution for your storage needs. Daily maintenance is a breeze just a quick wipe with a damp cloth. 【Pls Note】The Stackable Storage Bins bottom rail is very convenient, making it even more convenient for you to store and retrieve items. 【 NOTE: These bins can only be pulled out up to halfway, so they can't slide out completely like a drawer. If you want to use them like a drawer cabinet, try leaning them against the wall so the wall can support part of them.】

name: Max & Finn Grow with Me Adjustable Kids’ Closet Organizer System, White
short_description: Made of laminated particle board with a non-toxic, white woodgrain finish The kids' closet organizer features adjustable clothes poles and lower shoe rack that can be attached on either side of the organizer to be sure this piece will fit perfectly in your child's closet The kids' closet features 3 open shelves (1 adjustable) and 4 open cubbies and 1 drawer with metal drawer slides and built in safety stops Clothing rods will support up to 50 lbs. Upper shelves and shoe rack will each hold 40 lbs. Cubbies hold 20 lbs. each. Drawer will hold up to 10 lbs. 1 year limited warranty. Assembled dimensions: 76.62"H x 68.69-95.44"W x 15.69"D
product_description: The dream is finally coming true! You're finally ready to move into your very first place - the perfect space for your children to live, love, laugh and grow with plenty of kids' closet storage for all their clothing and accessories. Plenty of space that is, until your little ones are big enough to choose their own outfits and promptly turn their closets into disaster areas when they can't easily reach their clothes. Enter the Little Seeds Grow with Me Adjustable Kids' Closet Organizer System! This kids' closet organizer was created with adjustable clothes poles to grow with your child as they get taller, plus a lower shoe rack that can be attached on either the right or left side to fit into most kids' closets. The 3 shelves (1 adjustable for your child's height) offer plenty of open storage. The drawer features metal drawer slides with built in stops for safety, while the 4 lower cubbies are perfect for shoes, toys or fabric storage bins (not included). This kids' closet organizer meets or exceeds the CPSIA Juvenile testing requirements and includes a wall anchor kit to ensure your child's safety. Little Seeds not only creates this and many more on trend baby to teen furniture pieces, we also partner with various environmental protection programs to protect pollinator and other wildlife habitats for future generations.
